name: Name That Plot Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: A mediocre composer tells of his jealousy and rage towards another composer.
questions.explanation:
Amadeus.

	F. Murray Abraham is terrific as the jealous Salieri.

questions.text: King Arthur and his knights set off on a quest to find the Holy Grail (and steal it from the irritating Frenchman).
questions.correct: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
questions.explanation:
Monty Python and the Holy Grail.

	A hilarious film. 'It's only a model.'

questions.text: Mistaken for a millionaire by a group of thugs, a guy must then help the millionaire get his kidnapped wife back.
questions.explanation:
The Big Lebowski & Big Lebowski.

	John Goodman is hilarious in this film.

questions.text: A law student figures out what really happened in the assassination of two Supreme Court Justices, putting herself and others in mortal danger.
questions.explanation:
The Pelican Brief.

	Julia Roberts plays Darby Shaw, the law student.

questions.text: A young Black writer finds companionship in an old, reclusive author.
questions.explanation:
Finding Forrester.

	Sean Connery is a great actor.

questions.text: An archaeologist and his father search for the Holy Grail.
questions.correct: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
options: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Monty Python and the Holy Grail
questions.explanation:
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade.

	Another excellent Sean Connery performance.

questions.text: Stars of a sci-fi show suddenly have to deal with the real thing as a group of aliens comes to Earth asking for their help in defeating an evil warlord.
questions.explanation:
Galaxy Quest.

	This movie is great. It stars Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, and Alan Rickman.

questions.text: Pro football players go on strike, so the coaches hire an odd assortment of replacement players.
questions.explanation:
The Replacements & Replacements.

	Rhys Ifans is funny as the Welsh kicker guy.

questions.text: When pro baseball players go to war, a candy bar maker starts an all-women's baseball league?
options: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
questions.explanation:
A League of their Own.

	This film stars Tom Hanks and Geena Davis.

questions.text: A teen goes back in time and almost prevents his parents from getting married.
options: Back to the Future Part III
Back to the Future Part II
questions.explanation:
Back to the Future.

	Starring Michael J. Fox and Christopher Lloyd.
